description:
KDE Slimbook Plasma VI Linux ultrabook is now available with AMD Ryzen 8845HS CPU, AMD Radeon 780M GPU, up to 96GB of RAM, full aluminum chassis, and KDE Plasma 6.1 desktop.

The post KDE Slimbook Plasma VI Linux Ultrabook Launches with AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Slimbook Plasma VI Linux Ultrabook Launches with AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS
